name: Pixelmator Pro Image
summary: A PXD file is an image file created by Pixelmator Pro, a professional image-editing program. It is the native format for saving images in Pixelmator Pro and includes image layers, adjustments, effects, and other edits made to the image. Only Pixelmator Pro can open PXD files; Pixelmator Classic and Pixelmator for iOS do not support the format.
